name: Tim Smith V-6
description: The 6th iteration of my personal website—a cybernetic masterpiece crafted with the enchanting harmony of SvelteKit, the precision of Typescript, and a dash of the mystical THREE.js. As you traverse these virtual corridors, may you find not just lines of code, but a symphony of pixels choreographed to dance in harmony with your digital wanderings. Welcome, dear traveler, to a corner of the internet where technology meets artistry in a dazzling display of creativity!
medium: Svelte, Typescript, THREE.js, SvelteKit, PostCSS, Vercel

name: Wolf In Sheep's Clothing
where: Digital Art I: Mount Hood Community College
description: "Wolf In Sheep's Clothing" is an adaptation of "Saturn Devouring His Son", a painting by Spanish artist Francisco Goya. I was hoping to reverse the play on the "Wolf in sheep's clothing", onlt darker.

name: Perfection
where: Digital Art I: Mount Hood Community College
description:
"Perfection" is a digital reflection of what I feel perfection is.

  • 1: Anxiety
  • 2: Imposter
  • 3: Stress
  • 4: "I'm not good enough!"
  • 5: Self-doubt
  • 6: "What will the think?"
  • 7: NOT POSSIBLE!!
  • 8: ?

name: Tim Smith V-5
description: The 5th iteration of my personal website—a cybernetic masterpiece crafted with the enchanting harmony of SvelteKit, the precision of Typescript, and a dash of the mystical THREE.js. As you traverse these virtual corridors, may you find not just lines of code, but a symphony of pixels choreographed to dance in harmony with your digital wanderings. Welcome, dear traveler, to a corner of the internet where technology meets artistry in a dazzling display of creativity!

name: Memory Game
description: I designed a delightful memory game leveraging the power of Svelte. What sets it apart? Well, I've seamlessly integrated a theme system, allowing you to effortlessly transform the visuals on the back of each tile. So, not only do you get to exercise your memory prowess, but you can also do it with a personalized touch.

name: Ropck Paper Sciessors Lizard Spock
description: All hail Sam Kass! This is a simple game of Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock made popular by Sheldon Cooper on "Big Bang Teory" I built this to practice my JavaScript ans svelte skills.
